data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Casale, Achille, Shi, Hongliang (2018): Revision of the Oriental species of Calleida Latreille (sensu lato). Part 1: Introduction, groups of species, and species of six species groups (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Lebiini). Zootaxa 4442 (1), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4442.1.1|12 occurrences
